Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
Pokemon.Cards.Card
Pokemon.Cards.Pokemon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Charmander, Pikachu
public class Pokemon extends Card

  • Constructor Details

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(int maxHp, int attack, int defense, ArrayList<PokemonTypes> resistanceTypes, int resistance, ArrayList<PokemonTypes> weaknessTypes, PokemonTypes type, int stage)
      A new base Pokemon
      Parameters:
      maxHp - The maximum HP this Pokemon has
      attack - The base attack damage of this Pokemon
      defense - The base defense of this Pokemon
      resistanceTypes - The resistance types of this Pokemon
      resistance - The resistance this Pokemon has against its resistance types
      weaknessTypes - The weakness types of this Pokemon
      type - The type of this Pokemon
      stage - Either 0, 1, or 2: what stage of evolution this Pokemon is

  • Method Details

    • evolve

      public Pokemon evolve(Pokemon evolution)
      Evolve a Pokemon
      Parameters:
      evolution - The Pokemon to evolve it into
      Returns:
      The evolved Pokemon or null if it hasn't been on the bench long enough
